channel.title: Conclusion on Canary deployments with Amazon EKS, Spinnaker, Istio and Prometheus
channel.description: Recent content in Conclusion on Canary deployments with Amazon EKS, Spinnaker, Istio and Prometheus

item.title: What Have We Accomplished
item.description: We have: Built EKS using a partner provided tool called eksctl Built EKS using a community contributed terraform module Built EKS using the recommended steps from AWS Deployed the Kubernetes Dashboard
